text: Orchard MRT Station (NS22/TE14) is a rapid transit station in Singapore. It is an underground station on the North South Line of the Mass Rapid Transit. The station is located along Orchard Road, on the boundary of Orchard and River Valley planning areas, Singapore. Its platform livery is maroon, but it is mostly clad with black marble. This station serves the western part of Orchard Road. The original name for Orchard was Orchard Boulevard. Category:Mass Rapid Transit (Singapore) stations
title: Orchard MRT station
